sentences: Hironobu Kageyama (影山 ヒロノブ, Kageyama Hironobu, real name written 景山 浩宣, born February 18, 1961) is a Japanese musician and singer prominent in the soundtracks for anime, video game and tokusatsu productions.
By the early '80s, the band split and Kageyama went solo.
Becoming immensely popular soon after, Kageyama went on to be dubbed the "Prince of Anime/Tokusatsu Songs" and is a main fixture for shows to this day.
[2018.08.06] Kage chan Pack ~Kimi to Boku no Daikoushin~
[2018.08.06] Dare ga Cover Yanen Anison Show
